name: Endless Sands
description:
You've spent many years combing the desert for the elusive town of Shezumty, said to have unearthed a mysteriously lost crypt from thousands of years ago. You've finally found it, but who knows what dangers - and treasures - are below..

A roguelite game where you try to survive and grab as much loot as you can before you escape.

Stats! Gear! Stores! All your favourite things! Scrape together some loot and attempt to finish an item set or make your own build!

-Rooms constantly get harder (and loot gets better) as you spend time in them
-A hidden boss that drops loads of loot
-Spend money on better gear and weapons
-Item set bonuses
-Local high score system

Current version: 1.61 Item Sets!

You can discuss any ideas, bugs etc. with the game on the official forum topic

COMING SOON:
-More items, weapons and effects
-Offhand items
-More enemy and scenery variety
